alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 10:29AM CDT until April 27 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:35 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 2.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate with high tides near or slightly above flood stage. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
